item.description:
Sun presents the Tech Days Boston, a not so mini Java One Conference right here in town.

_Sun Microsystems_: "Advance your development ability and shape your future with cutting-edge technical education; Sun Tech Days are loaded with practical information, examples of real-world solutions, and hands-on training. Whatever your focus, you'll find sessions to take your skills to the next level and advance your career."

Sun Tech Days Boston

On day two there'll be free tracks:
* _Featured keynote_:
James Gosling
Vice President and Sun Fellow
Sun Microsystems, Inc.
* Java Development Tracks
** Java EE 6 and GlassFish
** Java SE 6 Top 10 features, Java SE 7 and OpenJDK
** Next Generation Web and Java Server Faces
** Consumer JRE: Java on Every Desktop OR Java Performance Myths
** Java ME: Extreme GUI Makeover for Mobile Phones
** SOA using OpenESB and JCAP
** Java Scripting: JavaFX Script and JRuby

* Solaris Development Track What Makes Solaris Interesting?
** Sun Studio Tools
** OpenSolaris Security Frameworks
** Integrating ZFS Into Your Applications
** Security Features in Solaris
** How To Develop Solaris Parallel Applications
** Solaris Networking For Developers

* Java ME HOL
* LAB-4450: Rapidly Building a Real Life Application with Ajax
* LAB-7280: Introduction to JavaFX Script Programming


Reserve the day in your calendar. I'll post more details as soon as they become available
item.name: Sun Tech Days Boston- Day 2
